Title: Zero-Sum
Plot: Skinner destroys evidence to cover up a woman's death and poses as Agent Mulder to complete the task. Mulder finds out about Skinner's deception and confronts him, and Skinner reveals that he is working for the Cigarette-Smoking Man in order to obtain a possible cure for Scully's cancer.
GuestStars: Lisa Stewart, Nicolle Nattrass, Fred Keating, Addison Ridge, Barry Greene, Paul McLean, Allan Gray, Christopher J. Newton, Sterling McKay
